en.page_subtitle: Our brand styles define the visual identity and typography that creates a consistent experience.
en.download_description: Download all logo variants in PNG and SVG formats
en.large_paragraph_sample: Blue is designed to adapt to your team's unique workflow. Whether you're managing complex projects or simple tasks, our platform provides the flexibility and power you need to succeed.
en.regular_paragraph_sample: Create custom fields, automate workflows, and collaborate in real-time. Our intuitive interface makes it easy for teams to get started while providing advanced features for power users.
en.small_paragraph_sample: Perfect for captions, metadata, and secondary information that supports your main content.
en.body_text_sample: Use darker text for primary content and important information that needs to stand out from secondary text.
en.mission_statement: Our mission is to organize the world's work by building the best process management platform on the planet.
en.security_description: Enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption and compliance certifications.
en.performance_description: Lightning-fast response times and 99.9% uptime guarantee for mission-critical work.
en.analytics_description: Real-time insights and customizable dashboards to track what matters most.
en.integration_description: Connect with 5,000+ tools including Slack, Gmail, Zapier, and custom APIs.
en.automation_description: Streamline workflows with intelligent automation that learns from your processes.
en.mobile_description: Full-featured mobile apps for iOS and Android with offline sync capabilities.
en.collaboration_description: Real-time collaboration tools with comments, mentions, and team workspaces.
en.customization_description: Fully customizable interface, fields, and workflows to match your business needs.
en.support_description: 24/7 expert support with live chat, phone, and dedicated success managers.
en.sales_card_description: Explore plans, discuss enterprise solutions, or schedule a personalized demo.
en.help_support_description: Have questions about features, experiencing issues, or want to share feedback? We're here to help.
en.divided_item_1_description: First item in the divided grid layout with clean borders.
en.divided_item_2_description: Second item showing the right column of the divided layout.
en.divided_item_3_description: Third item in the bottom row of the divided grid.
en.divided_item_4_description: Fourth item completing the divided grid pattern.
en.project_management_description: Organize your team's tasks and track project progress from start to finish.
en.team_collaboration_description: Enable seamless communication and real-time collaboration across your entire team.
en.workflow_automation_description: Automate repetitive tasks and streamline your processes to save time and reduce errors.
en.analytics_reports_description: Get detailed insights and comprehensive reports to make data-driven decisions.
en.enhanced_team_collaboration_description: See your work your way with multiple views, real-time updates, and seamless collaboration tools. Switch between Kanban boards, calendars, timelines, and more to match your team's workflow.
en.project_management_views_description: Learn about different ways to visualize your work
en.real_time_collaboration_description: How teams work together in Blue
en.custom_workflows_description: Create custom workflows for your team
en.powerful_automation_workflows_descriptio: Create sophisticated automations without code using our visual workflow builder. Connect tools, trigger actions based on custom conditions, and save hours of manual work every week.
en.testimonial_1_quote: Blue just helps keep things completely organised â€” it's an absolutely wonderful tool.
en.testimonial_2_quote: The automation features of Blue help us run our operations seamlessly.
en.testimonial_3_quote: My entire life is in Blue! I love how fantasticly responsive the team is.
en.testimonial_4_quote: If you're wondering if you should buy Blue...the answer is YES.
en.deloitte_quote: Blue has transformed how we manage our global consulting projects. The automation features have saved us countless hours and improved our client delivery significantly.
en.cisco_quote: The flexibility and power of Blue's platform has enabled us to standardize processes across our entire organization while maintaining team autonomy.
en.testimonial_grid_1_quote: Blue has completely transformed our project management workflow. The intuitive interface and powerful automation features have made our team 3x more productive.
en.testimonial_grid_2_quote: The white-label capabilities of Blue have been instrumental in scaling our client services. We can now deliver enterprise-grade solutions with our own branding.
en.testimonial_grid_3_quote: We've saved hours every week using Blue's automation tools. The ROI has been incredible - it paid for itself within the first month of implementation and it just keeps getting better.
en.stats_heading: Leading companies trust Blue to streamline their operations
en.news_bar_main_text: Blue Design System 2.0 is now available with enhanced components and dark mode support.
en.join_us_heading: Join us in shaping a future of technology
